description:
Head out for a weekend, a week or an epic thru-hike. Whatever you put inside, the LightWire™ frame transfers weight to a comfortable spacer mesh harness and hipbelt. This suspension system ensures all-day carrying comfort, especially in warm conditions when the mesh back panel provides airflow around your torso. On lightweight missions, swap out the top lid for the included FlapJacket lid to save weight.

  • Ultralight NanoFly™ 100-denier nylon and UHMWPE ripstop body is incredibly tear-resistant
  • PFC-free DWR finish for superior weather protection
  • AirSpeed ™ suspension system uses tensioned mesh to float the load on your back, while allowing air flow
  • Removable floating top lid can be replaced with the integrated FlapJacket lid to protect your gear and minimize weight
  • Removing the top lid reduces carrying capacity by 9L and weight by 80g
  • Zippered hipbelt and lid pockets provide secure storage
  • Ladder adjustment system offers a wide range of torso adjustability
  • Adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • Internal compression strap keeps loads stable
  • Multiple lash points on the lid and front panel let you secure extra gear
  • Large front stretch pocket for stashing layers on the go
  • Compression straps keep your load tight and tidy
  • Dual ice axe loops with handle capture by upper compression straps
  • Dedicated internal hydration compartment with Osprey Hydraclip for easier reservoir hanging. (reservoir sold separately)
  • Recommended for loads up to 18kg
name: Osprey Exos Pro 55 Backpack - Men's
